title: President Donald J. Trump Is Taking Action to End Human Trafficking â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
October 11, 2018
My Administration will focus on ending the absolutely horrific practice of human trafficking.
						President Donald J. Trump					ENDING HUMAN TRAFFICKING: President Donald J. Trump and his Administration are working to end the scourge of human trafficking, also known as modern slavery.TAKING ACTION AT HOME AND ABROAD: The Trump Administration is taking the fight to human trafficking on all fronts, carrying out robust domestic and international efforts.A THREAT TO OUR COUNTRY: Human trafficking is a threat to homeland security, public health, and the rule of law.
